description:
Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who`s going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There`s no love lost between Buggy the Clown and the Straw Hat captain, but they`d better work together if they want to survive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Reunion in Hell?! The Man Who Ate the Chop-Chop Fruit!
Jigoku de Saikai!? Bara Bara no Mi no Jitsuryokusha!
Retrouvailles en enfer ! L`homme qui a mangé le fruit de la fragmentation !
Воссоединение в аду?! Съевший фрукт Бара-Бара!
地獄で再会!? バラバラの実の実力者!
